channel.title: CVE Feed for RSA -- RSA Netwitness Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RSA -- RSA Netwitness Platform

item.title: CVE-2019-3725|2024-08-04T19:19:17.787Z -- rsa -- rsa%20netwitness%20platform
item.description: RSA Netwitness Platform versions prior to 11.2.1.1 and RSA Security Analytics versions prior to 10.6.6.1 are vulnerable to a Command Injection vulnerability due to missing input validation in the product. A remote unauthenticated malicious user could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the server.

item.title: CVE-2019-3724|2024-08-04T19:19:18.264Z -- rsa -- rsa%20netwitness%20platform
item.description: RSA Netwitness Platform versions prior to 11.2.1.1 is vulnerable to an Authorization Bypass vulnerability. A remote low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to administrative information including credentials.
